_instructions: This file controls all aspects of report generation.
All CLI flags and environment variables have been replaced by this config.
query: Data query parameters and date range
output: Output file settings and options

site.site_description: This survey was conducted from the southbound parking lane outside 500 Clarendon Avenue, directly in front of an elementary school. The site is located on a downhill grade, which may influence vehicle speed and braking behavior. Data was collected from a fixed position over three consecutive days.
site.speed_limit_note: The posted speed limit at this location is 35 mph, reduced to 25 mph when school children are present.

_field_notes.location: REQUIRED: Survey location name or address
_field_notes.surveyor: REQUIRED: Organization or person conducting the survey
_field_notes.contact: REQUIRED: Contact email for survey questions
_field_notes.speed_limit: Optional: Posted speed limit in mph (used for compliance reporting)
_field_notes.site_description: Optional: Detailed description of survey location and conditions
_field_notes.speed_limit_note: Optional: Additional context about speed limit (e.g., school zones)
_field_notes.latitude: Optional: GPS latitude for map marker (decimal degrees)
_field_notes.longitude: Optional: GPS longitude for map marker (decimal degrees)
_field_notes.map_angle: Optional: Rotation angle for map display (degrees)

_field_notes.cosine_error_angle: REQUIRED: Mounting angle in degrees for cosine error correction (critical for accuracy)
_field_notes.sensor_model: Optional: Radar sensor model name (for documentation)
_field_notes.azimuth_fov: Optional: Horizontal field of view (for documentation)
_field_notes.elevation_fov: Optional: Vertical field of view (for documentation)

_field_notes.start_date: REQUIRED: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD format or unix timestamp)
_field_notes.end_date: REQUIRED: End date (YYYY-MM-DD format or unix timestamp)
_field_notes.timezone: REQUIRED: Display timezone (e.g., US/Pacific, UTC, US/Eastern)
_field_notes.units: Optional: Display units (mph, kph, mps) - default: mph
_field_notes.source: Optional: Data source (radar_objects or radar_data_transits) - default: radar_objects
_field_notes.model_version: Optional: Transit model version when using radar_data_transits - default: rebuild-full
_field_notes.min_speed: Optional: Minimum speed filter in display units (filters out slow/stopped vehicles)
_field_notes.histogram: Optional: Generate histogram chart (true or false) - default: false
_field_notes.hist_bucket_size: Required if histogram=true: Histogram bucket size in display units (e.g., 5.0 for 5 mph buckets)
_field_notes.hist_max: Optional: Maximum speed for histogram (truncates outliers for better visualization)

_field_notes.file_prefix: REQUIRED: Prefix for generated files (PDF, LaTeX, charts will use this prefix)
_field_notes.output_dir: Optional: Output directory path (default: current directory) - will be created if missing
_field_notes.debug: Optional: Enable debug output for troubleshooting (true or false) - default: false
_field_notes.map: Optional: Include location map in report (true or false) - default: false, requires lat/lon
_field_notes.run_id: Optional: Unique ID for this report generation (auto-generated if not provided)
